hero.title: About Eagle Home & Construction
hero.subtitle: Building dreams, creating lasting legacies. We are your trusted partner in bringing architectural visions to life with excellence and integrity.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a passion for excellence in construction, Eagle Home & Construction has grown from a small local contractor to a trusted name in the industry. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create beautiful, functional spaces that exceed our clients' expectations.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have successfully completed hundreds of projects, from intimate residential homes to large-scale commercial developments. Our commitment to quality craftsmanship, transparent communication, and client satisfaction has earned us the trust of clients both locally and internationally.
story.paragraph3: Today, we stand proud as a company that not only builds structures but also builds relationships. Our team of experienced professionals brings together expertise in architecture, engineering, and construction management to deliver projects that stand the test of time.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional construction services that transform our clients' visions into reality, while maintaining the highest standards of quality, safety, and sustainability. We are committed to building not just structures, but lasting relationships based on trust and excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading construction company recognized for innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction. We envision a future where every project we undertake becomes a benchmark of excellence and a testament to our commitment to building better communities.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every project is executed with meticulous attention to detail and adherence to the highest industry standards.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We build lasting relationships through honest communication, transparent pricing, and reliable project delivery.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace modern construction techniques and technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions that meet evolving needs.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: We proudly serve clients worldwide, providing seamless remote support and ensuring your project succeeds regardless of distance.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to bringing your vision to life

ceo.name: Eagle Leadership
ceo.description: With over 15 years of construction experience, our leadership brings vision and expertise to every project.

projectManager.name: Project Management
projectManager.description: Our project management team ensures timely delivery and seamless coordination of all construction activities.

architect.name: Design Team
architect.description: Our architects blend creativity with functionality to create spaces that inspire and endure.

experience.title: Proven Experience
experience.description: 15+ years of successful project delivery across residential, commercial, and industrial sectors.

international.title: International Expertise
international.description: Serving clients globally with comprehensive remote support and regular project updates.

commitment.title: Quality Commitment
commitment.description: Every project backed by our commitment to excellence, safety, and customer satisfaction.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life. Contact us today for a free consultation.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Eagle Home & Construction ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
informationCollect.item1: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, mailing address
informationCollect.item2: Project Information: Details about your construction project, budget, timeline, and requirements
informationCollect.item3: Communication Records: Correspondence, inquiries, and feedback
informationCollect.item4: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and website usage data

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.item1: To provide and improve our construction services
howWeUse.item2: To communicate with you about projects, quotes, and updates
howWeUse.item3: To process payments and manage contracts
howWeUse.item4: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our business, conducting our services, or serving our clients, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.item1: Access: Request access to your personal information
yourRights.item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
yourRights.item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
yourRights.item4: Objection: Object to processing of your personal information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using the services of Eagle Home & Construction, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: Eagle Home & Construction provides comprehensive construction services including:

clientResponsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
clientResponsibilities.item1: Provide accurate and complete information about project requirements
clientResponsibilities.item2: Obtain necessary permits and approvals as required by local authorities
clientResponsibilities.item3: Make timely payments according to the agreed payment schedule
clientResponsibilities.item4: Provide site access and cooperate with construction activities

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Payment terms will be specified in individual project contracts. Generally, payments are structured in phases based on project milestones. Late payments may incur additional charges as specified in the contract.

projectTimeline.title: Project Timeline
projectTimeline.content: Project timelines are estimates based on normal working conditions. Actual completion dates may vary due to weather, material availability, permit delays, or changes to project scope. We will communicate any significant delays promptly.

warranties.title: Warranties and Guarantees
warranties.content: We stand behind the quality of our work. Specific warranties will be outlined in your project contract. We use quality materials and follow industry best practices to ensure durable, long-lasting results.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Eagle Home & Construction shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate a project contract under conditions specified in the individual agreement. Termination terms, including payment for work completed and materials purchased, will be outlined in your project contract.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
